Local Time is: 01/30/2019 09:22:13.999   Nanoseconds: 1892064064
GMT Time is: 01/30/2019 14:22:13.999   Microseconds: 999999
Date/Time should be 19721202: 12/02/1972 00:00:00.000
Date/Time should be '19910223 16:23:45.230': 02/23/1991 16:23:45.230
Date/Time should be '19910223 16:23:45.230': 02/23/1991 16:23:45.230
Date/Time should be '20100207 12:00:00.000': 02/07/2010 12:00:00.000
Date/Time should be '20100207 12:32:00.000': 02/07/2010 12:32:00.000
DateTime::diff_seconds(): Time difference between different time zones is not implemented currently.
----- Testing DateTime's add_days()

Now is: 10/23/2018 10:24:01.123
After adding 1 day: 10/24/2018 10:24:01.123
After adding -1 day: 10/23/2018 10:24:01.123
After adding 1 weekdays day: 10/24/2018 10:24:01.123
After adding -1 weekdays day: 10/23/2018 10:24:01.123
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/24/2009 09:30:00.000' you get '12/28/2009 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/24/2008 09:30:00.000' you get '12/26/2008 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/24/2006 09:30:00.000' you get '12/26/2006 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/23/2005 09:30:00.000' you get '12/27/2005 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/23/2004 09:30:00.000' you get '12/27/2004 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/22/2000 09:30:00.000' you get '12/26/2000 09:30:00.000'
After adding 2 weekdays days to '12/24/1998 09:30:00.000' you get '12/28/1998 09:30:00.000'

----- Testing DateTime's GMT vs Local time

GMT now time: 01/30/2019 14:22:13.-1062   1548858133
GMT ALT Constructor time: 01/30/2019 14:22:13.000   1548858133

Local now time: 01/30/2019 09:22:13.-1061   1548858133
Local ALT Constructor time: 01/30/2019 09:22:13.000   1548858133

GMT 1970 ALT Constructor time: 01/01/1970 00:00:00.000   0

Local 1989 ALT Constructor time: 12/14/1989 20:15:23.000   629687723
GMT 1989 ALT Constructor time: 12/14/1989 20:15:23.000   629669723

----- Testing DateTime's diff methods

di1 is: 01/01/2002 12:54:31.000
di2 is: 02/01/2002 03:50:30.000
second difference between di1 and di2: -2.64576e+06
minute difference between di1 and di2: -44096
hour difference between di1 and di2: -734.933
day difference between di1 and di2: -30.6222
business day difference between di1 and di2: -22.6222
week difference between di1 and di2: -4.3746
After adding 10000 weekdays days to 19700101, the date is 04/30/2008 00:00:00.000

----- Testing DateTime's DST vs EST (Going Forward)

	Going from EST to DST

03/31/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143781200
04/01/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143867600
04/02/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143954000
04/03/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144036800
04/04/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144123200
04/05/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144209600
04/06/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144296000
04/07/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144382400
04/08/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144468800
04/09/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144555200
04/10/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144641600


	Going from DST to EST

10/28/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130472000
10/29/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130558400
10/30/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130644800
10/31/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130734800
11/01/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130821200
11/02/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130907600
11/03/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130994000
11/04/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1131080400
11/05/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1131166800
11/06/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1131253200
11/07/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1131339600


	Going from EST to DST in one shot

03/31/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143781200
04/10/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144641600


	Going from DST to EST in one shot

10/28/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1130472000
11/07/2005 00:00:00.000 --- 1131339600

----- Testing DateTime's const char * constructor
